resources.string: To view a note tap the name of the note from the list below. To edit, email, or delete a note, press and hold a note from the list below until the note menu appears. To search for a note press the search icon in the menu bar above.

To view all of the notes within a subject tap on the name of a subject from the list below. To edit or delete a subject, press and hold a subject from the list below until the subject menu appears. To search for a subject press the search icon in the menu bar above.

To view, edit, and delete a reminder tap on the name of a reminder from the list below. Reminders can be created by typing keywords in your note such as \'quiz\', \'test\', \'remember\', any days of the week, \'due\', \'project\', \'presentation\', and \'study\'.
Tap here to type your note.
Tap here to type the name of your note.
Tap here to type the subject name of the note.
